full_output.summary: A Passionate undergraduate computer science student from SRM University with a strong passion for de- veloping innovative software solutions. capable in a number of programming languages, such as C, Python, C++. Eager to leverage my skills to solve real-world business problems using next-gen technologies.

projects.name: Hotel Management System
projects.description: The Hotel Management System implemented in C efficiently handles room reservations by assigning rooms based on customer details(name,email,gender) and offers an admin portal for managing customer profiles, staff, and expenses. The system supports booking, editing, and monitoring guest details while ensuring smooth hotel operations.

projects.name: Virtual Voice assistant
projects.description: The Python based Voice Assistant provides hands-free control for various tasks, including web searches, opening websites, and managing files. It allows users to interact via voice commands to perform actions such as opening applications, creating folders, and changing voice settings.

projects.name: Grocery Store management System
projects.description: The Grocery Mart Management System implemented using C++, manages product and staff details, calculates profits, and maintains records. It supports adding, updating, and retrieving data for products and employees, while tracking overall profit.

full_output.name: Krishna Varshita Borra
